title: The Lie Detector
verse_text: When he lies, he speaks his native language, for he is a liar and the father of lies.
insight: If the thought steals, kills, or destroys—it’s not from God.
one_minute_win: Test one negative thought today against John 10:10.
declaration: I reject lies. I embrace life.
